comments: Claxton (BKN) cleanly blocks Ivey's (DET) shot attempt before the ball has reached its apex.
Wilson (BKN) legally contests Sasser's (DET) jump shot attempt.
Brown Jr. (DET) is moving alongside Thomas' (BKN) path, and the contact during the driving shot attempt is marginal.
Thomas (BKN) is moving alongside Brown Jr.'s (DET) path, and the contact during the driving shot attempt is marginal.

After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the court (defensive goaltending) was overturned to an inadvertent whistle.  Claxton (BKN) cleanly blocks Brown Jr.'s (DET) shot attempt before the ball reaches its apex.  At the time of the whistle, the Nets had imminent possession and play correctly resumes with Brooklyn ball.
Sasser (HOU) brings his left hand toward Schroder's (BKN) side and marginal contact occurs as he brings the ball up the court.
Sasser (DET) is moving alongside Schroder's (BKN) path, and marginal contact occurs as they come together at the same spot.
Brown Jr. (DET) is moving toward Schroder (BKN) and marginal contact occurs as they come together along the sideline.
Sasser (DET) extends both hands forward and initiates contact with Schroder (BKN) that affects his SQBR.
Sharpe (BKN) legally contests Brown Jr.'s (DET) jump shot attempt.
